words.def: A website that allows users to reflect, share opinions, and discuss various topics in the form of an online journal, sometimes letting readers comment on their posts. Most blogs are written in a slightly informal tone personal journals, news, businesses, etc. Entries typically appear in reverse chronological order.
wet spongy ground of decomposing vegetation
a man who serves as a sailor
an easy return of a tennis ball in a high arc
a segment of the trunk of a tree when stripped of branches
a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else)
